Feeds whishlist¶

This is a list with various feeds, which are either currently not supported or the usage is not clearly documented in IntelMQ.

If you want to contribute documenting how to configure existing bots in order to collect new feeds or by creating new parsers, here is a list of potentially interesting feeds. See Feeds documentation for more information on this.

This list evolved from the issue Contribute: Feeds List (#384).

Lists of feeds:

  • threatfeeds.io

  • TheCyberThreat

Some third party intelmq bots: NRDCS’ IntelMQ fork

List of potentially interesting data sources:

  • Abuse.ch SSL Blacklists

  • Adblock Plus Malwaredomains

  • apivoid IP Reputation API

  • APWG’s ecrimex (private)

  • Berkeley

  • Binary Defense

  • Binary Defense

  • Bot Invaders Realtime tracker

  • Botscout Last Caught

  • Carbon Black Feeds

  • CERT.pl Phishing Warning List

  • Chaos Reigns

  • Critical Stack

  • Cruzit

  • Cyber Crime Tracker

  • DNS DB API

  • Facebook Threat Exchange

  • FilterLists

  • Firehol IPLists

  • Google Webmaster Alerts

  • GPF Comics DNS Blacklist

  • Greensnow

  • HP Feeds (not a feed, but a feed format)

  • IBM X-Force Exchange

  • ISC SANS

  • ISightPartners

  • Malshare

  • Malware Config

  • Malware DB (cert.pl) (private)

  • MalwareDomainList

  • MalwareDomains

  • MalwareIntelligence

  • Manity Spam IP addresses

  • Marc Blanchard DGA Domains

  • MaxMind Proxies

  • mIRC Servers

  • Monzymerza

  • Multiproxy

  • OpenBugBounty

  • Payload Security

  • Project Honeypot (#284)

  • ShadowServer Sandbox API as expert bot (private)

  • Shodan search API

  • Snort IP Blacklist feed (see also this blogpost

  • Spamhaus Botnet Controller List (BCL) (private)

  • SteveBlack Hosts File

  • The Haleys

  • Threat Crowd

  • Threatstream (private)

  • TOR Project Exit addresses

  • TotalHash as expert bot

  • UCE Protect

  • URI BL

  • Virustotal Search as expert bot

  • virustream (unmaintained?)

  • VoIP Blacklist

  • YourCMC

IntelMQ is a solution for IT security teams for collecting and processing security feeds using a message queuing protocol.
